human.name: Human
human.description: A versatile and adaptable race, known for its ability to thrive in any environment. Humans learn quickly, easily adapt to new circumstances, and often display a variety of talents, from martial arts to magic. Their short lifespan drives them to act decisively and innovatively.
human.stats: Strength: +1, Dexterity: +1, Constitution: +1, Intelligence: +1, Wisdom: +1, Charisma: +1

dwarf.name: Dwarf
dwarf.description: A hardy people of mountains and caves, dwarves are renowned for their resilience and mastery in blacksmithing and stonework. Their culture is deeply tied to traditions, and their sturdy bodies allow them to endure the harsh conditions of underground life. Dwarves value order and often become reliable allies.

duergar.name: Duergar
duergar.description: Dark dwarves living in the Underdark, duergar are known for their suspicion and expertise in crafting magical artifacts. Life in darkness has toughened their bodies, but their isolation from sunlight has made them less sociable. They value discipline and often employ psychic abilities.

wood_elf.name: Wood Elf
wood_elf.description: Masters of the forest and nature, these elves live in harmony with the world around them, possessing exceptional agility and perception. They are skilled archers and healers, drawing strength from trees and rivers. Their longevity allows them to accumulate deep knowledge of nature.

dark_elf.name: Dark Elf
dark_elf.description: Cunning elves from the underground world, known for their grace and magical abilities. Life in darkness has made them masters of intrigue and poison, and their beauty often conceals a dangerous nature. They worship a spider goddess and have a strong connection to magic.

halfling.name: Halfling
halfling.description: Small and agile, halflings love comfort and a simple life. Their small stature allows them to avoid dangers, and their friendliness makes them favorites in communities. They often become unmatched thieves or merchants.

gnome.name: Gnome
gnome.description: Small but cunning inventors, gnomes are famous for their mechanical marvels and magical illusions. Their curious minds and wit allow them to create complex devices, while their love for jokes adds a unique charm.

half_elf.name: Half-Elf
half_elf.description: A blend of human and elven blood, half-elves combine human resilience with elven grace. Their versatility allows them to pursue various paths—from warriors to sorcerers. They often serve as mediators between races.

half_orc.name: Half-Orc
half_orc.description: Strong and resilient, but rough, half-orcs are descendants of orcs and humans. Their strength in battle is unmatched, but their social skills suffer due to stereotypes. They often strive to prove their worth.

dragonborn_fire.name: Dragonborn (Fire)
dragonborn_fire.description: Descendants of dragons with fiery breath, these warriors burn with a passion for battle. Their scales protect them from fire, and their magical power allows them to unleash flames. They honor dragons as their ancestors.

tiefling.name: Tiefling
tiefling.description: Descendants of demons with magical abilities, tieflings often face prejudice due to their demonic appearance. Their magical nature allows them to control dark forces, and their charisma attracts both friends and enemies.

aasimar.name: Aasimar
aasimar.description: Descendants of celestial beings with a holy aura, aasimar radiate light and hope. Their strength comes from a divine calling, and their wisdom helps guide others toward goodness. They often become priests or paladins.

goliath.name: Goliath
goliath.description: Giant warriors from mountain peaks, goliaths live in harsh conditions where only the strongest survive. Their endurance and strength make them ideal fighters, and their love for competition shapes their lives.

tabaxi.name: Tabaxi
tabaxi.description: Feline creatures who love adventure, tabaxi are known for their grace and curiosity about the world. Their agility allows them to avoid dangers, and their hunter instincts make them excellent trackers.

firbolg.name: Firbolg
firbolg.description: Large forest beings living in harmony with nature, firbolgs are protectors of the woods. Their strength comes from the earth, and their wisdom stems from a spiritual connection with animals and plants.

kenku.name: Kenku
kenku.description: Bird-like creatures that mimic sounds, kenku have lost their own voices but compensate with cleverness. Their agility and cunning make them unmatched spies, though their social detachment complicates communication.

lizardfolk.name: Lizardfolk
lizardfolk.description: Lizard-like creatures from the swamps, lizardfolk survive thanks to their endurance and instincts. They are masters of survival in the wild, but their cold nature makes friendships with other races difficult.

triton.name: Triton
triton.description: Sea creatures living in the depths, tritons wield the power of the ocean and water magic. Their charisma reflects the beauty of the sea depths, and their endurance helps them survive underwater storms.

bugbear.name: Bugbear
bugbear.description: Large, hairy creatures who love ambushes, bugbears are natural predators. Their strength and endurance make them dangerous in combat, but their roughness repels allies.

goblin.name: Goblin
goblin.description: Cunning and agile, but not very pleasant, goblins live in chaos and love to steal. Their agility allows them to avoid dangers, and their intellect helps them devise clever plans.

hobgoblin.name: Hobgoblin
hobgoblin.description: Militaristic goblins with discipline, hobgoblins are masters of strategy and tactics. Their endurance and strength make them valuable soldiers, and their intellect makes them leaders.

orc.name: Orc
orc.description: Wild and fearless warriors, orcs live for battle and glory. Their strength is legendary, but their aggression and low intellect often lead to conflicts with other races.

yuan_ti.name: Yuan-Ti
yuan_ti.description: Serpentine creatures with magical abilities, yuan-ti are masters of poisons and charms. Their grace and intellect make them dangerous foes, and their charisma hides their sinister nature.

harengon.name: Harengon
harengon.description: Rabbit-like creatures who love to hop, harengons combine agility with a cheerful demeanor. Their speed helps them avoid dangers, and their charisma attracts friends on their journeys.

satyr.name: Satyr
satyr.description: Jovial creatures who love music, satyrs embody joy and rebellion. Their charisma captivates listeners, and their agility helps them escape the consequences of their antics.

minotaur.name: Minotaur
minotaur.description: Powerful creatures with a bull’s head, minotaurs are natural warriors. Their strength and endurance are perfect for combat, and their wisdom helps them navigate labyrinths.

verdan.name: Verdan
verdan.description: Small goblinoids that grow quickly, verdans combine agility with endurance. Their short lifespan encourages them to live vibrantly, and their charisma attracts allies.

centaur.name: Centaur
centaur.description: Half-human, half-horse creatures who love freedom, centaurs are masters of riding and combat. Their strength and agility make them unmatched in the steppes, and their wisdom reflects their connection to nature.

classes_descriptions.barbarian: A fierce warrior who fights in a rage.
classes_descriptions.bard: A musician who inspires allies with magic.
classes_descriptions.cleric: A servant of the gods who heals and protects.
classes_descriptions.druid: A nature mage who harnesses the power of the forest.
classes_descriptions.fighter: A weapon master who excels in close combat.
classes_descriptions.monk: A martial artist who channels the energy of the body.
classes_descriptions.paladin: A holy warrior who fights for justice.
classes_descriptions.ranger: A hunter who knows the ways of nature and tracking.
classes_descriptions.rogue: A master of stealth attacks and trickery.
classes_descriptions.warlock: A dark mage who makes pacts with demons.
classes_descriptions.wizard: A master of magic who uses spells in battle.
classes_descriptions.witcher: A monster hunter who uses alchemy and a sword.
